title: Ninja, Toaster Oven, Air Fryer, Thermometer, Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo, Stainless Steel, Quick meals, Fries, Frozen Food, Air Fry, Dehydrate, Reheat, 13-in-1, Less Oil, Flip Away Oven, Foodi, SP351
description: The Ninja Foodi Dual Heat Air Fry Oven gives you versatility in the kitchen with 13-in-1 functionality from Air Fry and Sear Crisp to Dehydrate and Reheat. With Dual Heat Technology, unlock up to 500°F cyclonic air and a directly heated SearPlate, which allow for fast cooking and restaurant-worthy results. Cook up your favorites and then flip the oven up and away to reclaim your counter space.
